content:
Hi All

The newly formed TSMG expects to have its conference calls available in the HL7 Conference Call system later this week. For now, please accept this message as a reminder of the TSMG regular meeting for this week.

Date / Time:
Tue Oct 5, 2021 05:00 PM (US Eastern Time, GMT -4 DST)
Tue Oct 5 2021 21:00 PM (UTC)
Please consult http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20211005T1700&p1=784 for your local times.

Web Meeting Info
https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/95054745574?pwd=RXhhTjdsWktUYjJQRXJFTW10NGpRZz09

Agenda / Meeting Notes
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TSMG/2021-10-05+TSMG+Agenda+-+Minutes

For further information or if you encounter any problems, please contact a member of the TSMG in this Zulip stream.

Thank you,
Reuben
